content.detailedDescription: I had observed 3-4 previous sightings in the company of another friend in different location (but all were within 40 miles of one another), my friend and myself regularily went out at night and did ufo watches to see what we could see. having had previous expierience/luck with our watches we were fairly sure of our abitily  in distinguishing the differance between stars, planes, helicopters, etc. this particular evening we were in the company of a third person whom was a very spiritual person whom had been interested in native spiritualality and shamanism, we had a small fire in my friends backyard, mostly for warmth as the light of the fire was considered *light pollution*i noticed a reddish orange light which very closely resembled mars. we were facing north west, and i made a mental note that it did not "look right". it was just a little too big to be mars as well as being in the wrong part of the sky. the light was stationary, made no noise and did not fluctate in brightness or color intensity. we all continued to look around and every once and a while i would look back at the light "keeping tabs on it" about one half hour after firstnoticing it, the light flashed a lot brighter than it had been. the color did not change just the intensity of the light. it was very quick like a camera flash. imediately the light began to drop slowly from the sky in a zig zag pattern, like a lightning bolt first down then right, then down then left, then down,,,,etc. right away i said to myself in a very strong thought ( ah ha i knew it i have got you) my friend has a mititary surplus night vision telescope and as soon as i saw it moving i ran to get it from inside his house. i was gone for no more than about 1 minute and when i was coming out of the house i could hear a jet, a low pitched roar...Not like a passenger jet, they have a high pitched wine...As i came down the front stairs i looked in the direction in which saw the light and noticed that it was gone, about 3 seconds later a small jet came into view. it is kind of hard to explain exactly  how it approached ...We were one quarter mile above the earls cove ferry terminal on the sunshine coast facing north west. the light was in the sky obviously, it was hard to determine the exact distance/elavation in which it was. (as i said it appeared to resemble mars or a star, i suppose at (star distance) ). when i went for the telascope i later learned that it had dropped down in front of nelson island and disapeared into a valley/draw on the south/ south eastern face of the island/mountain, which in turn (knowing the area quite well) told me the light was only about one quarter to one half mile away at an elavation of maybe 1 to 2 thousand feet. the approaching jet came up from behind the island as though it had been traveling at about 1 to 2 hundres feet in elavation. i flew in from the north west, my impression was that it was using the island to as cover as it snuck up from behind the light. as the jet came up and over the island the light was gone and the aircraft banked left and then right very quickly as if the pilot was trying to look directly below himself.   it flew off in the same south east direction in which it initially had been traveling. about 5 min. later either it or another jet flew in from the west directly over the area in which the light had initially been, it then accelerated noticably and flew off towards vancouver island, acctually towards comox airforce base.We continued watching the skies and had no further sighting, after about an hour we decided to go in as it was late and cold.**my distint impression was that it was watching us, watching it**   the next night we were out again watching the skies as we had done the previous night, we did not see anything in the sky that was out of the ordinary when my friend said what's that! the other fellow and myself looked in the direction in which he was looking and i saw a light on the other side of the street in which his house was located, at the enterance of his driveway he has a couple of giant boulders one on either side of the enerance. the light appeared just behind one of them as though it was peeking around from behind it. the light appeared to be about the size of a soccerball from where we were. as soon as we realized it was there (a time frame of about 2-3 seconds) my friends dog began to growl. it had been sitting with us, it did not move (the dog) i picked up my flashlight and began walking fairly quickly towards it, i turned on my flashlght and shone it towards light, i moved to the end of the driveway next to my truck and stopped and observed it. i began to evaluate the light, 2-3 seconds later my flashlight dimmed out from full light to no light in about 4 seconds. i began resonable deducting as to what it might be...The first thing came into my mind was that it was a porch light of someones house being barely visible through the trees. i realized remembered that there were no houses in that direction. then i thought maybeit was the underside of an alder leaf , when you shine a lght off the bottom of the alder leafs they are very light green/white and sometimes appear to be a light. then the thought of a light from someones house came back to mind,,....** not my own thoughts resurfacing,,,,for say but more like the thought was being put in my head. i really had the impression/feeling that the thoughts were incoming as apposed to being generated in my own head**. i remembered that i had concluded that it could not be a house light. then the alder leaf theory came back into my head so i decided to test the theory,....   i picked up a baseball sized rock from off the ground and tossed it directly where the alder tree would have been had the light actually been a leaf. my friend has several alder trees about 10 to 15 feet tall next to the boulders at the head of his driveway,...When the rock landed on the edge of the pavement on our side of the road/pavement not only did i realize that it was not a leaf but that the light was in fact on the other side of the road, a distance of (from myself to it about 45-50 feet) about 1 second after  i got a feeling of conclusion and urgency, about 1 second after that the light blinked out. more than a blinking out it was as though it had sped off directly away from me, like when on star trek the enterprise jumps to warp speed and gets smaller and smaller in the fraction of a second. there were many trees that would have been in it's way and it would have had to navigate it's way through them creating an irregular zigzag path. it did not it just blinked out, got smaller and smaller almost all at once. the light was a smoky white color not just a big dot it was like a very dense swirling ball of smoke, not a lot of distinctive lines or details just emough to be ditinguished. we began talking about it and my friend whom had initially seen it desribed it as the same swirling ball of smoky stuff but, he had seen, what could best be described as golen(ish) eye. thats it just an eye. we never saw anything else that evening.  the one fellow whom had been with us freaked out and we had to calm him down for he thought we were seeing spirits and i am pretty darn sure that it was not  for we had seen the light in the sky as well as a jet(which i am positive was a fighter jet from the comox airforce base).
content.summary: Shape was unknown but, the light was round and very reddish orange/crimson red.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car in a residential area of haverhill, ma going back home from picking up a pizza.  as i drove up hilldale ave. i noticed a light in the sky that looked stationary.  i had no idea what it was but because it wasn't moving it caught my eye.  as i got closer, i pulled over letting cars go past me, and leaned out of the window to see this object almost directly above me (i estimate it was 1200 feet above me).  the object was not moving and was completely silent.  as i looked up i saw a dark grey triangular object (see drawing) with two red lights and at the bottom two criss-cross long panels with white lights on them.  the strangest part of what i saw (besides the hovering with no sound) was the cobalt colored "blue mist" surrounding the object.  from the moment i looked at this object until it started to move was probably 5 seconds ( i had this feeling that "it" or "something" knew i was observing it, and that's why it moved so quickly from its stationary position.  when it started to move it made a low whooshing sound (almost like a "quiet" fighter jet and at a lower frequency).  as it moved, the "blue mist" surrounding it stayed with the object.  it moved slow, but seemed to get out of my sight quickly, which seemed odd.  so i probably observed this object for about 40 to 50 seconds total, with about  12 seconds looking up close (5 seconds not moving, and 6-7 seconds moving away).  i thought of trying to follow it, but didn't.  i actually felt very lucky to see something like this. it kind of hit me as i was driving away that they could have come from another part of our universe, another time of this earth (past or future), or from another dimension.
content.summary: Saw triangular object directly above me hovering with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to las vegas from new york on delta.  the pilot announced we were about to pass the grand canyon.  

looked out the window, seen this stationary object to the north, couldn't make out the shape, but was small and not far at all. i told my friend sitting new to me to check it out and he found it strange as well.  it then made a jog to east, then out of no where, all that could be seen was blurry rings of circles after it disappeared.  the circles were not smokey, seemed like circles of vibrations, very strange.
content.summary: Object close to my plane

content.detailedDescription:
On or about october of 1992( near halloween)at 10:30 pm i was living at 11464 dennison road forestvlle new york,i was waiting for my stanley sales lady to deliver my order.I was looking down the road an saw many colored lights flashing about 1/4 mile away.When my friend came i asked her to look down the road and asked her if she knew what the flashing lights were?She said she saw them when she came down the road and saw them too.She said'lets drive down there and take a look.I said i think they are too far away as they looked like they were over lake erie.Whe got in the car and were watching the lights as we approached they were already up to where we were.We pulled over to the side of the road.As we were approaching one of them had shot away side ways and the second one seem to follow.The 3d one was starting to move away slowly as we were under or actaully it was hovering over near us.There was no sound and i guess thats what was the scarriest.They were very large.The lights kept flashing.We both got out .  i went around to the passenger side to be near my friend.I got a littl queezy and scared and kept saying what in the he-- is that.I told her we should get back in the car and we did.This object stayed over there for it seemed like 5 minutes but i guess it was only a couple of minutes.The 3rd on streak sieways to catch up with the other 2 as it seemed as though they were waiting for it.When it got nearer to the other two they just streaked and dissapeared in a distance.We got back in the car and she dropped me off without eiher one of us saying too much to each other.When i got back home i called a radio station to see if anyone called in.There was no report.I called the niagara falls  air base  there wasn't  any .Report.They gave me a number to call.

  that was a governmment # for reporting suspicious things??It was friday night late and there as no answer.I waited until monday and called the nuber.I reported it what i saw and they said, someone would get back to me.No one ever did that!I have never written about it before today i was on the aol people chats and i read about other people saw things.I put my story on and last night i saw another special about ufo on tv and i decided that i needed tell someone who would believe me.As you feel like a nut and no one would beive you anyway unless they saw the same thing.I don't like to think about it and usually i don't.That is my story &iswear it is true.I asked my friend why she wasn;t as excited and afraid as i was and she told me she saw this before.And you know i did believe her.I believe there is something that our government knows and is not telling us.Why???
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 large objects/many flashing lights/fast moving

content.detailedDescription: I want to report something that happened yesterday evening in sanford, michigan. three friends and myself went out boating on sanford lake at 5:00 p.M., march 26, 2007. we launched the boat at the sanford lake park public access and headed north up the lake. we boated for about 3 hours and headed back south toward the public access. the weather was unusually warm that day (76 degrees which broke a record from 1925!) and the sky was mostly clear. it was around 8:30 p.M. and the sun had almost set. we could see venus and several star constellations. we saw a few planes way up in the sky with their usual aviation lights. however, as we were boating south on the water, my friend noticed a big bright yellow ball of light hovering just above the tree line. from where we were, it seemed like it was the size of a jet plane and shaped like a lemon. we also saw a light beam coming out of the bottom at about a 45 degree angle. the light only emitted a short distance from the object. it was moving south very slowly and seemed to be keeping pace with our boat (we were going very slow). all of us saw the light and we watched it for 7-8 minutes and it stayed at tree line level the whole time. we then boated under the us-10 over pass. when we came out from under the over pass and could see the object again, bu then it began to rise very slowly, straight up into the sky. we watched it rise for 2-3 minutes and it ended up about 45 to 50 degrees up from the tree line where it stopped and hovered motionless. as we watched it, it looked like something wrapped around the light and it went out and disappeared. the way it went out was strange. it looked like a blanket wrapped around it, almost like a cloak wrapped around it in a counter clock-wise direction. and it just disappeared into thin air. needless to say, we were all pretty wide-eyed about the experience and confirmed to each other what we had seen. we all agreed that it was definitely not a helicopter as the shape and lights were not that of a copter and the way it just disappeared like a light being turned out was very unusual. two of the witnesses have flown many times in helicopters and are familiar with them. this is the second time i've encountered an unexplainable object in the sky.
content.summary: Large lemon shaped yellow light sighted over sanford lake, michigan

content.detailedDescription:
1. on february 28, 2007 i had been filming my grand kids playing in our backyard with my new canon model zr850 camcorder. after the kids had gone in to eat lunch i saw a high flying jet and thought i would see if i could capture a video of the plane going over.
 soon after i started filming a second jet appeared into view close to the first jet so i tried to get both into view. after a few seconds i noticed something go through the view finder very fast and to the bottom of the jet.

2. i saw the (second object) object for only a second or two when it came through the view finder from left and disappear from view to the right. i only saw the first object after i downloaded the tape to my pc and went through the section of video frame by frame.
 
3. i had (have) no idea what the objects were.

4. the objects seemed to be two bright points of light traveling to the top and bottom of the jet. (maybe to the right and left of the jet would be a better description?) the first object to come into view seems to turn away from the plane as it got closer. the second object passes by the jet and disappears from view.

5. i was curious at the time as to what the objects were as i still am.

6. the objects passed from view in the viewfinder. i don't think i would or could have seen them with the naked eye. 

 i have very little experience with camcorders and to my knowledge all settings were set at the factory default settings.
 i will attach a small clip of the section of the tape as i don't know if i can e-mail the entire clip being it is about 130mb. the clip i'm sending is only about 5 seconds long but if you go through it frame by frame you can see both objects. 
 if possible let me know what they may be.
  thanks for your help.
       doug cartledge
content.summary: While filming two jets flying over my home i saw what appeared two small bright objects fly by the jets. one seemed to turn away, the other flew pass the jet.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were going to a bar after dinner. we were driving down rout 537. it was about 830. i am remembering this from around 1989. we saw the onject through the driver side window. it was a long distance from us. it traveled with us for about 25 min. it made no noise. it then turned and disapered. i watched it throuh the back window the car was a camaro with a big back window. we didn't say anything about it for a while that night. my freind saw it too. i don't know what made me spot it. it was a clear night. might have been the light /brighness of the object.It grabbed my attention from nowhere. i have driven that road often without seeing anything. i was intrigued, curious, scared and awed.
i thought it was a plane or the moon at first.
content.summary: It was oval /oblong strange shpe yellow white ike colro, not the moon. i think it may have had some  orange in it too.

content.detailedDescription: I was parked outside one of the dorm houses waiting for a friend to come out. i looked out of the sunroof of my car directly straight up at the sky and there it was. it was a white cigar shaped object without wings. i kept blinking my eyes because i was trying my hardest to find some sort of wings on the object, there were none. so i thought to myself, "perhaps its a helicopter" but it had no characteristics of a helicopter neither. in my area there are lots of news and police helicopters always around the area, so i'm used to spotting them, but this object was just weird. it flew like a airplane very straight and with a constant speed in a perfect straight line across the sky. it was at a pretty high altitude, yet moving a lot quicker than a normal airplane would be moving at that altitude. again i live by new york and newark, so i see many airplanes on a daily bases. this object was just different simply because it made no sound, had no apparent wings and flew at a high altitude with above average speeds. there where no lights on the object and i watched it as it flew from the right of me towards the sunset on the left side of me clear across my view of the sky.
content.summary: Cigar shape ufo over bloomfield college moving at a steady spead at about

content.detailedDescription:
Ive had a dozen sightings of these "lights", star like. the two most interesting happened in '97 and '01. the first occurred while i was sitting on my front porch having a cigarette. as i was stargazing at a patch of sky to the north, the 5-7 stars i was looking at began to slowly form the shape of a circle, then began rotating clockwise, like a wheel or a childs pin wheel in the wind. after about 5 seconds they dispersed and the lights slowly faded away. i was aw struck  

the second also happened in northern california. i was about four hours away from point reys on foot hiking tword the ocean.  once i got to the coast it was dark. while i was standing on the beach and looking out over the water. a light appeared at close range but never emerged from the fog. as i was standing there i was once again aw struck by the light. i entered a kind of half awake half dream state and a mental image of the crafts interior appeared in front of my eyes. i saw two human figures inside standing up observing me as i was looking back at them, the air inside was super clean, like something in a laboratory clean room. the image in my head was crisp,clear and in black and white.  and the only way i can clearify this experience to you is something a kin to what happens to a person after they set down a book theyve been reading for several hours, thier i.Q. and eye sight are raised to crisper and clearer levels. after about 5 seconds of this the light slowly faded away as it always does.

ive mostly kept this to myself until now, i dont know why im coming out with this. im afraid people will think im nuts. but after seeing other people do it on the history channel i figured what the hell, what harm can it do. 

thank  you,
content.summary: Jaw dropping aerial acrobatics. no doubt e.T.

content.detailedDescription:
i was jr. in college,,it was weekend and my buddy and i had 2, girls that we took to my house for evening swim ,,, parents had pool,, i took girl and blanket,, and went to park across the street from our house and we were laying on blanket looking at stars,, and doing what kids like to do ,,so all of sudden,,, i look up and see,, round metal disk,, aprox 80,, to 100,, diamiter,, it was not flat on bottom it had a slight redius,,,and the color was exactly,, like copper on bottom of paul revere,, skillet,, it was not shiney,, but tarnished,, and it was going about,, 8,, to 10 miles per hr. the clear night,, and good street lights gave us a pretty good look see,,, it came from east and was traveling west,, i looked at bottom looking for port,, and gang of rivets like on air plane when gear is up,, i could not see anything,, in avaliable light it looked flush,,i told girl look,, you are looking at ufo,, and then i said ,, you are looking at techonolgy we are not aware of,, there was no engine noise,,that damn thing just floated,,, and was on a corse,, i was really moved,, i told her let,s go ,, we went to house,, and i called lambert field,, control tower,, and i spoke to a,t,c controller,, i said to him i just saw,, ufo,, and gave him vector,, and described ,, craft and speed ,,, and he said ,, i see it ,, as we spoke he was looking at it,, 
i knew how to get to atc,, because i am pilot,, with multi eng rating,, 
i took my first flying lesson when i was 14,, my father was flyer,, and we always had at least one airplane,, most of time we had 2,, planes,, we loved flying,, i then signed off from atc,, and called the big radio station,, in town,,kmox,, i got business ,, and news desk,, and described the event,, it was clear night and i guess lots of people were out,, it was really nice summer night,, the man at news desk said i was 8th ,, call on the object,, i was really moved ,,, i really didn't know how aircraft,, could stay in air with no obvious propulsion ,, that was really goofy,, i still have not figured that out,, it,s beyond my,, knowlege,, about a month went by and i contacted usaf,, they sent me a packet with little pictures of goofy little space ships,, it was very goofy,,, i wanted to be,,de briefed,, by scientest,, i wanted to talk to someone with a brain,, this damn thing really got my attention ,, that was 40 yr. ago,, and i can remember it like yesterday,, i was watching history channel ,,, when i saw mufon,,,!!!! before that night,, when i saw  hillbilly,s,, talking about little green men,,, i thought ,,, ya,,, right,, i went to college for 6,,yr,, did graduate work ,, and i only hang with very smart people,, honest injin,, im not a nut case,, i lost track of girl,, but she would not be much help ,,, she had no idea what was going on,, i drink a beer ,, now ,, then,, and have never did drugs,, you see flyer,s,,, don,t do drug,s
drug,s are for idiot,s,,, 

           thank you for this site,, it,s a good thing,, i know something is out there,,, when i see those idiot,s,,, down in mexico throwing hubcaps,, and saying look ,,, it,s ufo,, that crap is so corney,, this thing actually scared the c---,,, out of me,, 

              thank you  

         ron von der ahe
content.summary: I was jr in college,,, and saw,, some thing flying,, and do not know  !!!!

content.detailedDescription: In summer of 1981 as i was coming home from work (worked 2nd shift and it was around 11:00pm), i was nearing my house out in the country (farm land as far as you eye can see) i noticed a flashing star that was north of me. i slowed down because i noticed the flashing object was getting closer.  within seconds the now bright object was hovering about 200 feet from me which i at that moment stoped to look at my reflection of my truck from the sphere. it might have been a minute before it left in the opposite direction at the same angle it came from. within seconds it was in space. it was a clear night without clouds.  the sphere made no sound as it was hovering and when it left. i was not so much shocked but stunned and kept it prety much to myself. at the time i was attending a private christian unversity and working 2nd shift at a bakery.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a mirror like sphere that was at least 50 feet in diameter

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Please call for details?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I see thim every cople of days.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright light......I thought  it was a star at first.   light was very bright.  then quickly faded while maving a very short distance in the night sky.  anyone else see anything like this before?  maybe a aviation move via a light reaction?
content.summary: Very bright light......I thought  it was a star at first.   light was very bright.  then quickly faded while maving a very shoert distance in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger in an automobile that was being driven along ocean drive in corpus christi, texas. it was about 30 minutes from sunset, headed away from downtown. i was casually gazing at the sky and the ocean when i noticed a metallic object low in the sky that appeared to be very bright. it was so bright, i pointed it out to the driver, wondering if it could be a shooting star.  the object appeared to be either very far away or moving towards us, because it was not moving across the sky or up/down. as we both were watching, the object suddenly moved incredibly fast. it moved first in one direction, then banked in a arc of blinding speed. it curved back and sped off over the ocean and disappeared into the sky. we both shouted in surprise and could not imagine what it was that we saw. we checked the newspaper to see if there was any plane being tested in the area or to see if anyone else saw it and reported it to the paper, but there was nothing about it. it was as if we were the only two people to have seen it. like any person in the u.S., i have observed hundreds of planes and flying objects, but nothing has ever moved like the object i observed that day. i have never forgotten the sight. i came to this website to see if anyone else had ever recorded seeing a similar object in corpus christi and decided to (finally) tell someone about what i saw that day.:-)
content.summary: Bright object moving at blazing speed unlike any plane by the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
My mom ruth & i were both in shock after i called out to her in the next room to come see what i heard as a low rumble noise of a ship or a triangled shaped vessel that appeared out out the south east. was what seemed like it came out of a wormhole cause it's appearance was so sudden, hard a big swooshing sound at first one moment there was nothing then there it was in the evening sky clear as day. this ship slowly moved forward northwest towards the arkansas river, oklahoma border in the evening sky. the vessel was very visible at a approximate altitude of no more than 400 yards up this ship was huge about 2 city blocks wide or more.  it was like it came out of a wormhole cause right before it was there i heard a big swoosh sound or something as i stood on the porch and looked up over my right shoulder.  wow there it was i called out to my mom in the next room and at age 70 she was as much in shock as i was eek!..I freaked at first.  oh my god i said to her there it is mom, as i told my family several times i had i had seen strange vessels cruising the skies.  i hurriedly walked out to the street corner for a clearer view as it went over my head towards the northwest.  as it went out of my view the evening sky suddenly went from light evening to almost dusk, and it felt very eerie as the night went to a lighter shade dusk lighter than the left top photo sample. i have tried not to tell too many people about this even family, but i feel i must speak out via the web to try to bring light to this event. this has really traumatized me in many ways as i hardly sleep nowadays, and yes i watch the skies most nights as i listen to coast. let me just tell you my life has completely changed after viewing this event, i also have had two other encounters with alien visitations, and it had taken me years just to recall those events. what i always knew existed in my heart has become so very real to me not only in the visual sighting of this ship or vessel.

let me just say i was got very excited i left my elderly mother standing there as i ran from the porch to the corner of n 8th and q street, then i stood there in awe under the street light as it went over my head, and yes i was very afraid at first but for some reason i had to get a closer look at the event.  something else very unusual occurred to me several days later this sighting, i began to itch profusely on my skin, and did not know why i began to itch, and just did not pay much attention to it at first but as several weeks went by it got worse.  maybe, possibly i was exposed to some kind of radiation or something i'm not sure what an i hope not, however; i'm still feeling the effect of this exposure from this event. i not one to embellish any report at all, and i did send a report about this to art bell at coasttocoastam featuring mr. george noory.  i've received no response from coast to date feb.07, but note a few days later another strange thing happen to my computer hard drive when i tried to boot up to windows, i simply could not boot it up. i later found out my hard drive had been completely erased by something or someone, and all e-mail's has been deleted as well from the mail on my  mail server at at&t online services not long after i reported the sighting.  a web address about the 2005 sighting: http://personalized-pc.Com/agent/ufo_vessel_sighting_over_fort_smith_arkansas_sept2005.Html

thank you for your help, james
content.summary: Saw object to my right in sky just appeared out of nowhere lights underneath glowing rotating a low rumble sound as vessel went overhead toward nw

content.detailedDescription:
February of 2007 we were looking at pictures taken august 06, when we noticed a ufo in the upper right hand corner of the picture.  really was not an "event" in that we were unaware of the object at the time the picture was taken.

1.We were hiking on the mid-mountain trail between pinebrook and the canyons resort in park city, ut.
2.We did not notice the object until looking at pictures 6 months later.
3.We cannot identify the object.
4.Cannot describe object from picture but it is disc like with some sort of legs coming off.
5-6.  we did not notice the object when the picture was taken.
content.summary: Object seen in picture taken 6 months ago on a hiking trip in the utah mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were traveling down rt.2 in my truck when we both at the same time saw a metal object floating above the highway, as we went under it,i could see the different sizes and shades of the metal like panels covering it.It was about 1 and half telephone poles high,so we pulled over along with acouple of other cars to watch it,it started to change colors and admit a smoke or steam around it,as it apeared to be spinning,then a red blinking light came on,on the bottom, and started to make a sheeee- sound,like the hydrolics pumps on fun park ride,then 3 round glowing balls came out of the bottom and started flying over our heads at a very high rates of speed,
i ran to my truck to get my camera,then i began to snap the first picture and 1 ball went back in,then i snapped second picture and second ball went in,and after the third picture third ball went in and like turning a light switch off, it disserpeared.
my friend and i said we would not tell anyone if the pictues dont come out.
next morning i dropped the film off at brooks in leo.
then after work i went to pick them up and the last 4 pictures were all black.
i feel that someone might have called it in and said that pictures were taken,and goverment? got them first.Or when the balls flew over at the end it did something to my camera?
my feelings on this object are that i am 110percent sure that it was not from this earth. 
it realy has changed my life.
i hope i live to see the day when there is proof for the world to see and beleive like i do.
content.summary: Not a goverment stunt because it being derctly over the highway if it fell could have killed people.

content.detailedDescription: my family and me were out side in my back yard i was grilling my family dinner and while i was out there i was looking at the sky because  i liked to look at the beauty of the sun starting to set and that day there was clouds. then i see what i thought was a bird because it looked to be about a couple hundred feet like a hawk or volture. then i noticed that it was moving like a plane and then it looked to be a couple thousand feet but then it stoped and did not move for a fue seconds. when it stoped i felt like something was loking at me or i was not alone. then it shot up over the clouds and disapiered and not like it went into a flash of light but just disapiered i told my family what i saw but they thought i just saw a plane so i thought about it for a second and just left it alone for almost a year but something just in the back of my mined just new that something was not right about what i saw then i was channel surfing and found out about this website on the history channel
content.summary: Plane like or bird shape with silver surface

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my front porch smoking a cigarette star gazing like i often do.  i first noticed the object as a moving light in the sky and thought it was an airplane.  but it was somewhat odd in that there were no flashing lights and it appeared to be quite distant but relatively large for something that distance away.  i first noticed the light at about twenty degrees to my left from vertical, this was to the north from the direction i was standing.  it continued moving north at a pace that made me first assume it was an airplane, however after a second or two of observing the object it suddenly reversed direction and accelerated to an incredible speed.  it went from roughly 50 degrees from horizontal to the north to disappearing over the southern skyline in less than one second!  while i could not accurately guess as to its altitude to gauge its speed it seemed to be at least as high as most overpassing airplanes if not much further.  i know this kind of accelleration and speed is not attainable by human air craft so the event left me quite stunned.
content.summary: It was a light emmitting object appearing like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
The one i saw one night coming home from work was round. it was over as section of the road i was driving on. it was just about tree top high and not moving. i drove under a small secetion of the round ufo and i got a close look at it. there was a row of windows around the center of the ufo and there was two windows that was larger then the rest of them. i could see forms of some kind sitting in these large windows. on the top side of the larger windows was huge beem light that was on and shingin down into the trees.  i cound not see what the light were shining on. the lights beem was so strong i believe you could walk on them. i cound not here any kind of motor it was not sitting on any thing, it was just suspended in mid air. the forms in the windows were busy and i saw movement behind the ones that was sitting. if i were to guess i would say they were conducting some kind of experement. this same one i saw it behind my house going up and down the lake. this thing would not stop, would not turn around but would go back the other direction as fast as it went down. it went up and down the lake about three times then left.  i have seen two other ufos one was saucer shape with a dip in the center and the other was oblong. all three of the sightings were in alabama. the round ufo i saw one night coming home from work when i like in baview. that area at the time was concidered to be very spookey and a lot of people did not like to take that road home. the lake was a dump and no one was allowed in it. we lived with our back door to the lake at that time.
  the ufo was so big that you could not miss it. i stoped but some thing scared me. there was something shouted out dont stop and it felt like the car rocked with that, and i left fast. i was shaking like a leaf and i went home and called the ufo number in the phone book. the saucer shaped ufo was over dora high school and the oblong one was across the road from there hovering over a place where the dumped coal that was sold to people who used it for heating there homes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a round one about midnight coming home from work 1979 or 1980.

content.detailedDescription:
Flying saucer encounter
compared with what i have read about other people���s encounters mine is rather tame, and it is old, but i would  like to have it on record.  i am an engineer having worked for companies involved in the design of aircraft, missiles, outer space vehicles and the like, as well as a math professor, having taught at long island university, brooklyn campus, some 25 years ago.  
this is my encounter;
my then girl friend (wife now) lived at 414 rosemont ave, la jolla, california, which is right off the beach.  on sunday night, october 17, 1965, at 7:15pm, we were walking along the edge of the beach only 1 block from our apartment. we were very startled and amazed, when suddenly there came into view 4 flying saucers, going southbound, about ��� mile inland and less than ��� mile in height.  they were flying fast in a diagonal line formation, were definitely piloted, each gently and separately undulating up and down as though slightly buffeted by the wind.  they emitted no lights and made not a single perceptible sound.  we had been easily hearing birds chirping in the distance but no engine sound or even a sound of airflow was perceptible, and the day was bright and clear and otherwise quiet. we were just out of earshot of the sound of waves hitting the beach.  these vehicles were not birds, not balloons, not airplanes, not swamp gas, not temperature inversions, not kites, not anything but saucer shaped vehicles. there could be no way we could be mistaken as everything was in day-clear close view. my eyes happened to concentrate on the under rim of the saucers. i saw a dark brown colored rim on the underside of the saucers of perhaps 2 feet in width.  the vehicles otherwise were approximately the color of aluminum. i saw 3 hemispheric undercarriages spaced circularly at 120 degrees apart.  i saw portholes.  my girl friend���s vision happened to concentrate on the top most portion and she saw yellow light in the portholes. they flew past us at perhaps 350 miles per hour and we had them in view maybe 6 seconds in all. they were less than ��� mile from us at the closest point. based on the angle subtended by the vehicles and my estimate of the distance to them, i would make an educated guess that their sizes were about 150 feet in diameter each and perhaps 20 feet in height not counting the height of their undercarriages. they flew in the direction of the san diego airport and seemed to be totally unconcerned at being seen or if it was a danger to them. they appeared to be their own masters. i phoned the san diego airport, the miramar naval station and informed them as well as the local police.  the police told me they had not received any calls thus far.  miramar naval station recorded my phone conversation but would not answer as to whether there were any other witnesses. after this encounter, my friend and i found a book in the library called ���flying saucers and outer space���, written maybe in 1955.  on one page there was a drawing of a flying saucer.  as soon as we saw it, we both said to each other ���that is just what we saw���.
mind you, prior to this, i and my friend had thought that those who said they saw flying saucers were seeing things by mass hallucinations, and gave these reports no credence at all. and neither of us had read a book on this subject.  my girl friend became very frightened at this incident, and i, foolishly wished they would have just stopped and taken me aboard for a ride. but, having worked as a mechanical engineer in the space industry for 20 years, and being well up on every flying vehicle known to man, for one thing i know of no vehicle now or even contemplated, that can fly without a very noisy engine to power it. if there was a noiseless engine it would have been put to very good use a long time ago, for example on the very expensive concord aircraft, which is only allowed to fly over uninhabited areas because of the incredibly loud noise it makes.  from this fact and my general feelings about this i must conclude (the u.S. government and any naysayers not withstanding) that these vehicles are of a very very advanced stage of technology and that they are not of this earth.  
eli  pine
content.summary: 4 flying saucers in formation seen in broad daylight and close.

content.detailedDescription: I had just woke up before daybreak and was headed south down the interstate when i saw something starting over the horizion on the drivers side.  i pulled over to the side of the road to watch. it was a wing shape craft that was well over 3 city blocks wide and over a city block thick. it was floatig about 300 feet in the air and moving very,very slow toward me. there was a small craft to my left in front of it and shaped like it. there was no sound and no engines only 4 large circles with what looked like large diamonds in them on each wing and a smaller one on the nose.  i have never told anyone because there was no one to tell at that time
content.summary: I was driving a !8 wheeler down the interstate going south when i saw it comming over the horizion

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10 am in the morning until about 11:30 am. three of us, all b-29 engineering officers in the air corps observed the object. the day was warm and totally clear.  the object was at 11 o'clock high. it never wavered, just sat there. remember,in 1944 ufo was a term unknown to us. it was not used until later. we theorized that it might be a jap balloon. but it never moved. it was shining brightly, but the sun surely was farther away. how could that be? later i became aware that some people seemed to see them glow. that bothered me for over 50 years!  i took the pains to liken it to one of several, new-from-the-factory, bright b-29 bombers that had just come to the field. we had 60 planes more or less. it appeared to be about the size of a dime on a 14 ft high ceiling. remember, we were young trained observers, in perfect physical condition. we were qualified to fly.

over the years i have wsatched ufo stories on tv and elsewhere never having an answer,always just more questions. i don.T know any more now than i did on that bright morning in 1944. i spent over forty years as a professional engineer - performing structural design for all types of structures. i am a highly experienced engineer and look hard, and long at something before expressing an opinion. where do we go from here?  i'm used to scoping something out and, at least, coming up with an opinion. 

what is your scope of work?  somewhere we have to form an opinion and get over with the exercise. i am 85 and 1/2 years young, with all the smarts i ever had, i believe.  we can not keep going on and on!  as you can see, i don't have that luxury.  
 one thing i can say to you is that we, for the first time in our history, in 1943-'46 had about 6 b-29 fields in a 400 mile radius with 60 very active aircraft on each one.  just think about it; this was at clovis army aiffield only about 200 miles from roswell. how does that grab you?  we went to the officers club for lunch and it was gone when we returned to the flight line.
content.summary: Watched disk-shaped object for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription:
Please take a look at these photos and let me know what you think.
i took a series of 16 pic's with my digital camera of my daughter jumping and posing in front of the sunset on the beach near malibu,ca.
 
when i loaded them onto the computer i noticed the white streak of light in the upper right hand of the pic(s) at first i thought "plane", but when i zoomed in on the area it doesn't indicate any image of a "plane" ...No wings, no tail....
also the time frame seems a bit odd for a "plane" as well as the trajectory. the object seems to be heading down at an angle that isn't characteristic of a plane.
 
i found it interesting that perhaps the back ground activity such as the rate of the sunset, the people on the beach, the kayaking person in the water and the horizon line/ treeline, would be helpful to someone to gage the speed of the object?
 
in addition to these photos i'm sending in 2 separate e-mails with a progressive "zoomed" in version of the pic's. i have numbered the pic's for reference purposes.
 
if you could have someone look at these pics and give me some feedback that would be helpful.
 if you would like to refer me to someone who could please feel free to forward my contact info to them.
content.summary: Ufo at sunset - after loading my digital pictures onto my computer i noticed an object in the sky when looking at a series of pictures i took at sunset on malibu

content.detailedDescription:
Witnesess
there where 3 of us on top of the house (since it`s flat, no roof)just relaxing chating in lieing position watching sky.

time
it was around midnight when, i saw slow moving 
object south-east of our position. 

the moment
i didn`t mention my sighting to my friends at first place, 
because i was confused at what i saw. couple of seconds later my
friend noticed it as well warning us on what he saw:
-look at that-
i confirmed him: -yes i can see it!
we all stood up!

position and movement
we just stared at what apeared to be- slow moving, silent dark triangle,
flying steadily from east to west and a litle to the south from our possition.

altitude of object
it was hard to determine the altitude and the size of the object.
but we estimated to be not higher than 100-150 meters (300feet aprox)from our position.
my friend gave an estimation as close as 70-80 meters.
we conclude that the size of object was unknown therefore we cannot
estimate exact altitude. therefore maybe it was maybe higher than 100 m

size of object
if altitude was corect than object was around 10-30 meters in size
roughly estimated!

duration
around 10-20+ seconds 

wanishing point
the object moved steadily to west when desapears from our sight.
it disapeared only as a result of distance, not to be confused wtih any other means of same word!

personal conclusions and emotions at the time sighting
first moment i saw the object i was confused, not sure what i`m seeing.
group of birds in delta formation?
nothing else! no meteorological phenomena, no aircraft manmade, nothing similar...
group of birds?
no way, sky would have been visible between them, and there is no way thay kept that perfect triangle shape all the time with absolutely no digression! no birds was my later conlusion!

i was excited after the event, and i noticed my friend was a bit afraid! because he saw something he could not explain i guess!
content.summary: Black, silent  triangle

content.detailedDescription: My friend that witnessed it with me said that she had seen the same disc shaped black spacecraft on several saturdays prior to this sighting.  she said she thought everyone knew about them and it was very common.  it hummed across the sky very slowly. it was flying from the south to the north. it was about as high up as an airplane that is not making a stop but passing over the city.  i lost sight of it when it disappeared behind the mountain by nellis afb.  my first reaction was my heart dropping down into my stomach because i had seen ufos on 3 other occasions prior to this one.  they were at night and flying erratically until they (3 lights)shot from one horizon to the other in a matter of seconds,like shooting stars without the trail of light behind them.  one time i saw 3 ufos being escorted by jet planes of some kind to the afb.  another time i saw just one(light) that shot across the sky from west to east and then hovered in the east sky until daylight.  i stayed up all night to watch it and it was bouncing around in the sky to the east like a marshmallow on the end of a clothes hanger but in the same little area. i witnessed each of these events from my front and back yard on e twain ave in las vegas. only the first one mentioned was in the daytime.
content.summary: The black ufo was flying over vegas on a saturday afternoon in plain sight.

content.detailedDescription: I just got back to my friends house (the friend lives 5 houses down from me) from riding my bike at a session at skaters paradise. i took my bike out of my friends car and started to ride back to my house when i looked up and noticed a glowing orb that was moving very fast then suddenly stopped and seemed to hover for a moment...Then it suddenly flew back the same way it came from and merged together with a larger triangle shaped object then sped off really fast. there was no noise coming from the triangular shaped object which i thought to be very wierd. i noticed the glowing orb because it was the only thing moving in the sky and it was brighter than stars, i thought it might have been a meteorite of somesort. i was very frightened when i seen it stop suddenly. i havent told anyone in fear that i will be ridiculed.
content.summary: Glowing orb and triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Took picture early leaving for airport in phoenix to come back to ohio.
noticed object turned to get camera, it was stationary, took picture. 
the camera is digital so i checked to see if picture took. when i wanted to take another picture the object was gone even tho it was standing still at first sighting. there was no sound or anything that might bring attention the the object.

on my computer i enlarged the area of the object and it was a little blury but still i could make out some details maybe from my imagination. 
that is why i am contacting you. i would really like to know if what i think i saw and took picture of is what i think.
content.summary: 2 saucers together with windows on top

content.detailedDescription:
I'll prefact my comments by saying that i was an f-4 phantom jet fighter pilot and a member of the astronaut program, so i'm familiar with jets in full afterburner and i had a good feel for how fast those of that generation could move -- including the sr-71. 

my sister and now ex-brother-in-law were visiting my wife and i.  my brother-in-law and i were sitting in the front seats on our way back from dinner at a restaurant and we were on the interstate headed west out of chicago toward o'hare. 

suddenly, i noticed some lights moving very rapidly away from us -- apparently more or less horizontally -- in a formation resembling a set of bowling pins.  i don't remember the exact number, but there were either 6 or 10.  i said to my brother-in-law "what the heck is that" and pointed.  he looked and saw it.  about that time, the formation of lights abruptly moved vertically and accelerated.  their size dwindled very quickly until they were just gone.  

at the time, i had vision that was superior to every other fighter pilot i'd ever heard of.  in fact, a flight surgeon once reported me to the commanding office of my group, claiming that i cheated on the comprehensive eye exam they give pilots because nobody could have scored so well and so quickly without cheating.  that said, within a matter of just a second or so, i could see nothing more.

by the time my wife and sister could lean forward to look out the windshield -- and they started to move forward about the time i exclaimed to everyone to "look", they could see nothing.

we heard no sonic boom.

i'm pretty sure the year was 1982, but there's a small chance it could have been 1981 and an even smaller chance it was 1983.  however, i'm not sure what month it happened, let alone the day.  i *think* that it was during one of the summer months, but i could easily be wrong about that.  if it should ever come to pass that you'd like me to try to do a better job of recollecting the event, i'll ask my wife (who is at work right now) and sister what their recollection is.
content.summary: Extremely high speed lights in bowling pin formation moved horizontally then vertically to disappear

content.detailedDescription:
Friday 23 march 2007, at approximately 9:20 pm, i was watching tv in bed.  it was my (jeff challender) 54th birthday. my wife came running into the room suddenly in a high state of excitement, and told me to come outside right now!  our son max had spotted something in the sky that he was certain was a ufo!! 
 
      i put on my bathrobe, and stepped out onto the front lawn.  there, in the sky, low over the houses across the street at 10 to 15��� above the horizon, was a ufo all right!  there can be no doubt about it!  it���s position varied from due west, to northwest during the time we had it in sight. this thing, which seemed to be at least a half-kilometer distant, was literally dancing about in the air.  it was soundless, and bright blue-white. 
 
     my wife rushed to get the camcorder, and once i got it started, continued to video tape this thing for almost 20 minutes!!  i can barely describe the excitement.  we watched this thing perform the most impossible maneuvers.  it moved behind trees, returned and went behind the trees again.  i hobbled up the street to follow it at one point, and it returned to its previous position, as if toying with me.  so i went back to my chair on our lawn, and sat down.  i ���told��� it i could not, and would not, chase it again, and that it had better stay in sight for me or i wouldn't continue to film it.  i said these things half tongue in cheek, but the thing seemed to respond!  it did come out from behind the trees, and stay there!  it continued to bob up and down, and flit from side to side.  right after i told it to do something, it brightened considerably and performed something like a ���fish hook��� maneuver!
 
    it's all so unbelievable even now!  finally, after nearly 20 minutes in sight, it dipped "behind" the neighbor's garage across the street.  my wife said, "oh, don't go away!".   after a moment or two, it came back up!  it stunted some more, finally going back down behind the same garage for the final time, which was due west of our location.  it didn't return.  it looked to us like it may have landed somewhere in the agricultural lands about a kilometer to our west! 
 
    we waited an additional 20 minutes or so, hoping it would come back again.  unfortunately, it did not.  so i went into the house and played the tape back on our tv.  the tape came out sensationally!  i did not zoom on the object but a couple brief times.  i held the camera quite steadily by propping my elbow on the armrest of the lawn chair, and kept the houses across the street in the field of view almost the entire time.  the film is incredible.  we couldn't sleep until well after midnight.  must have watched the tape a half-dozen times last night. 
 
can't wait to get into the full analysis, with enlargements and speed manipulation.  in the end, i'll have a 30 to 45 minute production detailing the entire event on dvd. 
 
     max saw the object first.  he says it was here wednesday night, after janet and i had gone to bed.  he tells us it was dancing around out there for at least an hour.  and that it hovered directly over our house for a time.  we have no reason to disbelieve max.  he told me about this sighting on thursday morning before he went to school.  
 
    so this thing was here twice in three days.  who knows, it may have been out there thursday night as well.  we didn't look.  
 
    our local mufon field investigator is jeremy ray. he came sunday 25 march 2007, to take down my formal report.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: What a wild birthday party !!!
